content:
Told then FBI general counsel James Baker about the alpha bank server activities before the two thousand sixty and election
He apparently shared the information with the slate journalist who wrote the story about the supposed secrets
Server and guess what
James Baker the former FBI general counsel testified behind closed doors closed doors last week so we don't know what other GM's he has released
[noise] but rest assured as long as congressional Republicans retained the house so that they can keep dragging these FBI officials before them
There are so many sordid details that still need to be unpacked and for those of you are frustrated
And rightfully so recognized this
We're dealing with the FBI yeah we're dealing with the highest levels including the director of the FBI and his top tier of officials unpacking
What they've done is not an easy thing it's not an easy thing at all it's a dangerous thing it's a frightening thing but that
Process is underway and I think some of them if they haven't already been done to correct I think if congressional Republicans will keep the heat on them
I think that you will see some of them beginning to crack especially if it looks like the pressure is on them [noise] my fear is we're twenty nine days from election day if Republicans don't hold the house and I think they will
[noise] if Republicans don't hold the house
Then Nancy Pelosi becomes a speaker
And any investigation into the FBI and the Democrat Party and Hillary's campaign the DNC and the media
Any and all investigations into that as the driven by Congress will evaporate
And the sad sad reality is that we may never know exactly what happened we may still never know
But it gives me great joy to know that those FBI officials at the top ranks who were part of this or squirming Peter ... with his little whimpering ways and Coby
Coby has to have at his core a fear that the things he was up to will be disclosed he has to deep down worry because Donald Trump is not a shrinking violet
And if he gets the goods on call me he's going to pursue it it's personal and we're at the point now where Trump is shown he does not fear these people he's into deep
He he is not walking away from the Bruce or as in the ... and the Rod Rosenstein means
And Bob Mueller by the way where's that Russian collusion here we are closing in on two years whereas our Russian collusion
[noise] I don't care about how much money they spent because it's a drop in the bucket for the federal government and I actually think that you do investigations when they're warranted this one
Wasn't to arrive at the truth and the cost to society is
